verses.roman:
'kemane chuṭilā' bali prabhu praśna kailā
ādyopānta saba kathā teṅho śunāilā

synonyms: kemane chuṭilā—how were you released; bali—saying; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; praśna kailā—inquired; ādya-upānta—from beginning to the end; saba—all; kathā—the narration; teṅho—he; śunāilā—described.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then asked Sanātana Gosvāmī, "How were you released from prison?" Sanātana then described the story from beginning to end.
